name: Raspimirror
tagline: Java FX Application for Magic Mirror
body:
###the idea
raspimirror is a Java FX based Application to run on a small computer (i.e. Raspberry PI) in combination with an LCD Monitor behind a two way mirror to build a magic mirror. The Application will work together with [raspiremote](https://github.com/chpressler/raspiremote) and can be controlled remotely, especially through voice control.

###Authors and Contributors

initiated by @chpressler. if you want to contribute please contact me

###Support or Contact
coming soon...
